hero.title: Experts in Application and
hero.description: We advise companies on formulating and executing projects for competitive funds such as CORFO, ANID, and FIA. Our Software Lab enhances projects with digital technologies and AI.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: We turn your ideas into funded projects. Expert guidance at every stage.

formulation.title: R&D&I Project Formulation
formulation.description: 5+ years track record with 85% approval rate for CORFO, ANID, and FIA funds. We transform your idea into a winning application with flawless technical forms and strategic budgets.

execution.title: Project Execution
execution.description: We take your project from paper to reality. As a CORFO-accredited Collaborative Entity, we offer a dedicated Software Lab, agile methodology, and integrated IP consulting.

rdLaw.title: R&D Law Advisory
rdLaw.description: Recover up to 52.55% of your innovation investment. We guide you through Law 20.241 with certified technical reports and CORFO-format official financial spreadsheets.

innovation.title: Innovation Management
innovation.description: Systematize your innovation to scale. We design your project portfolio, protect your intellectual property, and map the best funding opportunities.

capital.title: Venture Capital Support
capital.description: We connect your startup with investors. We prepare your pitch, validate your business model, and open doors to national and international venture capital.

ai.title: AI Assistance
ai.description: Supercharge your applications with artificial intelligence. Our Claude assistant analyzes your project and helps you write more competitive proposals.

research.title: Research Lines
research.subtitle: Areas of expertise of our research team.

dataScience.title: Data Science
dataScience.description: Machine Learning for analysis and prediction. Advanced artificial intelligence models.

imageProcessing.title: Image Processing
imageProcessing.description: Image analysis and biometric processes with cutting-edge technology.

smartIoT.title: Smart IoT
smartIoT.description: Intelligent cloud interconnection of devices for innovative solutions.

successCases.title: Success Cases
successCases.subtitle: Projects we have developed with CORFO funding

aquaculture.title: Aquaculture Virtual Assistant
aquaculture.description: Submarine monitoring system with AI for automatic detection of net damage, debris and dead fish.

solar.title: Photovoltaic Fault Detection
solar.description: Predictive maintenance system with ML to detect microfractures, hotspots and dust on solar panels.

electrical.title: Electrical Infrastructure Vision
electrical.description: GIS platform analyzing videos and images to detect and geolocate cable failures and obsolete wiring.

warehouse.title: Warehouse Image Processing
warehouse.description: Automated inventory platform using cameras to monitor real-time stock across multi-level racks.

floating.title: Floating Solar Island
floating.description: First Latin American floating photovoltaic plant on mining tailings with innovative flotation design.

cherry.title: Cherry Crop Software
cherry.description: AI software predicting yield and caliber via IoT sensors, image processing and meteorological data.

birds.title: Bird Collision Detection
birds.description: System detecting collision-risk birds with audio/visual alert modules for wind turbines.

logistics.title: Logistics Optimization
logistics.description: Cloud platform optimizing multiple logistics parameters across distribution networks using FIFO model.

industries.title: Industries We Serve
industries.subtitle: Experience across multiple sectors with customized solutions.

pricing.title: Plans & Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that best fits your needs

contact.subtitle: We're ready to help you secure funding for your innovation project.

footer.description: Research, Development and Innovation Center Forcast. Experts in R&D&I project application and development for competitive funds.

landing.subtitle: CIDIF.TECH helps entrepreneurs and startups navigate public and private funding opportunities across LATAM, USA, and Europe.
landing.featuresSubtitle: Powerful tools to help you find and win funding for your startup.

cta.subtitle: Join hundreds of startups that have already secured funding with CIDIF.TECH.

global.description: Access funds from LATAM, USA, and Europe all in one place.

projectDetail.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this project? This action cannot be undone.

newProject.title: New Project
newProject.subtitle: Set up your project to apply for funds
newProject.name: Project Name
newProject.descriptionPlaceholder: Briefly describe your project, what problem it solves and your value proposition...
newProject.pitchDeckHelp: Link to your presentation (Google Drive, Dropbox, etc.)
newProject.problemStatementPlaceholder: What problem does your product/service solve? Who experiences this problem?
newProject.valuePropositionPlaceholder: What unique value do you offer? Why should customers choose you over alternatives?
newProject.targetMarketPlaceholder: Who are your target customers? What is the market size?
newProject.businessModelPlaceholder: How do you generate revenue? What is your pricing strategy?
newProject.competitiveAdvantagesPlaceholder: What makes you different from competitors? What barriers to entry do you have?
newProject.technologyDescriptionPlaceholder: Describe the technologies, frameworks, and innovations used in your product...
newProject.cofoundersPlaceholder: Name, role, and relevant experience of each co-founder...
newProject.keyTeamMembersPlaceholder: Key hires, their roles, and relevant experience...
newProject.advisorsPlaceholder: Names, expertise, and how they support the project...
newProject.teamBackgroundPlaceholder: Relevant experience, academic background, previous achievements of the founding team...
newProject.previousGrantsPlaceholder: List of grants won, awards, accelerators, incubators...
newProject.projectObjectivesPlaceholder: Specific, measurable, and achievable project objectives...
newProject.expectedImpactPlaceholder: Expected impact on the market, industry, or society...
newProject.environmentalImpactPlaceholder: Environmental benefits or considerations of the project...
newProject.socialImpactPlaceholder: Social benefits, jobs created, communities impacted...
newProject.timelineMilestonesPlaceholder: Main milestones with estimated dates (Month 1-3: X, Month 4-6: Y...)
newProject.keyActivitiesPlaceholder: Main activities and tasks to achieve the objectives...
newProject.riskAssessmentPlaceholder: Main identified risks and mitigation strategies...
newProject.goToMarketStrategyPlaceholder: Market entry strategy, distribution channels, partnerships...
newProject.useOfFundsPlaceholder: Breakdown of planned use of funds (% personnel, % technology, % marketing...)
newProject.rdActivitiesPlaceholder: Planned or ongoing research and development activities...
newProject.previousCustomersPlaceholder: References from current or previous customers, strategic partnerships...
newProject.lettersOfSupportPlaceholder: URLs or description of support letters from customers, partners, institutions...

trlLevels.5: TRL 5 - Technology validated in relevant environment
trlLevels.6: TRL 6 - Technology demonstrated in relevant environment
trlLevels.7: TRL 7 - System prototype demonstration in operational environment
trlLevels.9: TRL 9 - Actual system proven in operational environment

ai.title: AI Auto-fill
ai.description: Your project has training context. Use AI to automatically fill the application sections based on your project information.
ai.noTrainingDescription: Train the AI agent with your project information to unlock automatic auto-fill.
ai.trainedHint: AI will generate responses based on your project context. You can edit the responses afterwards.
ai.noTrainingError: The project has no training context. Please train the AI agent first.
ai.genericError: Error generating AI responses. Please try again.

agentTrainer.title: Train AI Agent
agentTrainer.description: Provide additional context about your project to help the AI assistant give you better guidance when applying for funds.
agentTrainer.contextPlaceholder: Describe your project in detail: problem being solved, target market, competitive advantages, technology used, team experience, business model, traction metrics, etc.
agentTrainer.contextHelp: The more context you provide, the better the AI can assist you with your fund applications.
agentTrainer.chatEmpty: Start a conversation to test the agent with your project context.
agentTrainer.chatPlaceholder: Ask a question about your project or fund application...
agentTrainer.errorMessage: Sorry, there was an error processing your request. Please try again.
agentTrainer.uploadHelp: Upload PDF or text files with your project information. Text will be automatically extracted and added to the agent context.
agentTrainer.uploadSuccess: File {fileName} processed and added to context
agentTrainer.uploadErrorType: Unsupported file type. Please upload PDF or text files.
agentTrainer.uploadErrorGeneric: Error processing file. Please try again.
